name: Chrono Killer (LD47)
description:
After being trapped in a facility and being experimented on for months, you are ready to make a break for it. Blast through guards, trap them in time loops, lure them into each other's fire... get creative.

Controls listed in game.

This game was made by ArcticK9 and I for the Ludum Dare 47 game jam, for the theme "Stuck in a Loop." You can rate it here.

Note that the Web version of the game does not have shadows or post processing effects for performance reasons. Please download one of the downloadable executables to get these effects, and please take that into consideration if you are rating the game.

Some sound effects courtesy of Dan "Pepper" Loeb.

Update: Oct. 7 2020 - Slightly changed the collider and physics of dead enemies to prevent them getting stuck and trapping the player.
